LanguageData.EggGeckoFertilized.label: Gecko egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggGeckoFertilized.description: A fertilized Gecko egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby Gecko. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggDeathclawUnfertilized.label: Deathclaw Egg (Unfertilized)
LanguageData.EggDeathclawUnfertilized.description: An unfertilized egg of a Deathclaw.
LanguageData.EggDeathclawFertilized.label: Deathclaw Egg (Fertilized)
LanguageData.EggDeathclawFertilized.description: A fertilized egg of a Deathclaw. If all goes well, it should hatch into a Baby Deathclaw. Eggs can be eaten raw, but are much better when cooked.
LanguageData.EggMirelurkUnfertilized.label: Mirelurk Egg (Unfertilized)
LanguageData.EggMirelurkUnfertilized.description: An unfertilized egg of a Deathclaw.
LanguageData.EggMirelurkFertilized.label: Mirelurk Egg (Fertilized)
LanguageData.EggMirelurkFertilized.description: A fertilized egg of a Mirelurk. If all goes well, it should hatch into a Baby Mirelurk. Eggs can be eaten raw, but are much better when cooked.
LanguageData.EggFireflyUnfertilized.label: Firefly Egg (Unfertilized)
LanguageData.EggFireflyUnfertilized.description: An unfertilized egg of a Firefly.
LanguageData.EggFireflyFertilized.label: Firefly Egg (Fertilized)
LanguageData.EggFireflyFertilized.description: A fertilized egg of a Firefly. If all goes well, it should hatch into a Baby Firefly. Eggs can be eaten raw, but are much better when cooked.
